long_description: Heat your chili or soup in the morning and pack it along in the vacuum-insulated Stanley Outdoor Food Jar. At the end of a long day of fishing or hiking, your meal will still be hot and ready to eat. Leakproof, packable and durable, it even includes a spork for complete portability. Vacuum insulation keeps food hot or cold for 12 hrs. 18/8 stainless steel is rustproof and naturally BPA-free. Stanley Outdoor Food Jar has a wide mouth and a 1-piece stopper that prevents leaks. Closeout.
short_description: Heat your chili or soup in the morning and pack it along in the vacuum-insulated Stanley Outdoor Food Jar. At the end of a long day of fishing or hiking, your meal will still be hot and ready to eat.
